byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: Fighting between Russian-backed separatist forces and Ukrainian soldiers in eastern part of country leaves at least 19 people dead, endangering ceasefire agreement.
lead_paragraph: Fighting broke out Wednesday between rebels and Ukrainian soldiers on the outskirts of the city of Donetsk, threatening an already fragile cease-fire.

headline.main: At Least 19 Killed in Fighting in Eastern Ukraine
headline.print_headline: At Least 19 Are Killed in Fighting in Ukraine

snippet: Fighting broke out Wednesday between rebels and Ukrainian soldiers on the outskirts of the city of Donetsk, threatening an already fragile cease-fire.

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
